title: Can't install League of Legends Windows Installer
body: When I tried to download league of legends I would get an error saying that "The Window Installer  Service could not be accessed. This can occur if you are running Windows in safe mode, (I'm not in safe mode) or if the Windows Installer is not correctly installed, Contact your support personnel for assistance." I am trying to fix it but I can't find any way to fix it. Can I please have some assistance?

replies.body:
My initial thought here is that your windows may not be up to date.  As a first step, make sure that you've updated Windows to the most recent version.  

If you continue to have an issue, I suggest using a[ file checker](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/929833) to make sure your OS is in working order.  Hope that helps!
